message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. It's a great deal considering its worth to you. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000.
Bob, I appreciate your interest but $10,000 is too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $11,500? This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.
